comment:
I'm planning a similar recipe and wanted to know if you had any comments on how it went and if you'd change anything. I'm making a Smash, so i need to pick a single malt and wondered if you had a recommendation based on your results.
Did you dry hop as well? If so, any details you can share?
Thanks!
Followed recipe as planned. Still in the fermenter. Did not dry hop. I based the recipe off of gumballhead, a hoppy wheat.
